
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
```

```{r}
stats <- read.csv('Inputs/KenPom Barttorvik.csv')
heat_check <- read.csv('Inputs/Heat Check Tournament Index.csv')
```


```{r}
df <- merge(x = stats, 
            y = heat_check, 
            by = c("YEAR", "TEAM.NO", "TEAM", "SEED", "ROUND"), 
            all.x = TRUE)

df <- na.omit(df)

desired_cols <- c("YEAR", "TEAM", "SEED", "K.TEMPO", "KADJ.O", "KADJ.D", "BARTHAG", "WIN.", "FTR", "TOV.", "OREB.", "X3PT.", "X3PT.D", "FT.", "WINS", 
                  "DRAW", "POOL.VALUE", "POWER.PATH")

df <- df[desired_cols]
```


```{r}
write.csv(df, "march_madness_aggregate.csv")
```
